name: US National Monuments Lite - What Landmark is this?
name_original: US National Monuments Lite - What Landmark is this?
description:
Think you're familiar with all 100 of the US National Monuments? Know what Devil's Tower or Rainbow Bridge look like? Take this quiz and find out!

US National Monuments Quiz Lite is a simple game that challenges you in identifying the 100 US National Landmarks.

This Lite version includes:

- 100 pictures of the US National Monuments
- Ads
- Game Center
- Global Leader board! Now you can be world champion
- Achievements - earn points for playing the game
- Links to more awesome quiz apps!

The game is pretty simple: You start with 60 seconds on the clock. Each correct answer is worth 5 points on the first try, 3 on the second, 2 on the third, and 0 on the last try. When you're done, save your score and share the results on Facebook.

We're sure you'll enjoy Tallest Buildings Quiz and find it enjoyable and challenging. Be sure and leave a review in iTunes. Please email us at support@stevensonsoftware.com with any questions.
